tasks.title: Project Planning
tasks.description: Plan the project timeline, resources, and milestones.
tasks.details: Identify key phases and deliverables, set up a Gantt chart, allocate team members.

subtasks.title: Identify Key Phases and Deliverables
subtasks.description: Determine the main phases and deliverables of the project.
subtasks.details: List out major milestones and critical tasks.

subtasks.title: Set Up Gantt Chart
subtasks.description: Create a visual timeline for project phases and tasks.
subtasks.details: Use project management tools to build the Gantt chart.

subtasks.title: Allocate Team Members
subtasks.description: Assign team members to specific tasks based on their skills and availability.
subtasks.details: Create a resource allocation table for project phases.

subtasks.title: Define Repository Layout
subtasks.description: Outline the structure of the version control repository.
subtasks.details: Decide on directory structures for code, tests, and documentation.

subtasks.title: Choose Version Control System
subtasks.description: Select the version control system (e.g., Git) for the project.
subtasks.details: Install and configure chosen VCS on all team machines.

subtasks.title: Identify Key Phases and Deliverables
subtasks.description: Determine the main phases and deliverables of the project.
subtasks.details: List out major milestones and critical tasks.

subtasks.title: Set Up Gantt Chart
subtasks.description: Create a timeline for project phases and deliverables.
subtasks.details: Use project management tools to create the chart.

subtasks.title: Allocate Team Members
subtasks.description: Assign team members to different phases and tasks.
subtasks.details: Based on skill sets and workload, allocate resources effectively.

subtasks.title: Define Repository Layout
subtasks.description: Plan the directory structure of the project repository.
subtasks.details: Decide on the layout for source code, tests, and documentation.

subtasks.title: Choose Version Control System (Git)
subtasks.description: Select a version control system for the project.
subtasks.details: Integrate Git for source code management.

tasks.expansionPrompt: How are you planning to prioritize and allocate resources for each phase of the project? What strategies will you use to manage milestones and ensure timely completion of tasks?

tasks.title: Repository Planning
tasks.description: Design and plan the project repository structure.
tasks.details: Define repository layout, choose version control system (Git), organize directories for source code, tests, documentation.

subtasks.title: Define Repository Layout
subtasks.description: Determine how the repository will be organized to efficiently manage project files.
subtasks.details: Identify main directories for source code, tests, and documentation. Use best practices for version control.

subtasks.title: Choose Version Control System (Git)
subtasks.description: Decide on the version control system to be used throughout the project.
subtasks.details: Select Git as it's widely adopted and suitable for most projects.

subtasks.title: Organize Directories for Source Code
subtasks.description: Set up directories to hold the project's source code files.
subtasks.details: Create subdirectories for different languages or frameworks used in the project.

subtasks.title: Organize Directories for Tests
subtasks.description: Set up directories to hold unit and integration test files.
subtasks.details: Use a standard structure like 'tests' with subdirectories for different types of tests.

subtasks.title: Organize Directories for Documentation
subtasks.description: Set up directories to hold project documentation.
subtasks.details: Create a 'docs' directory with subdirectories like 'api', 'user-guide', etc.

tasks.expansionPrompt: What is the expected size of the repository, and how will different teams or individuals access it? How are you planning to organize directories for source code, tests, documentation, and assets?

tasks.title: Ingestion Framework Development
tasks.description: Develop the framework for ingesting audio and video files.
tasks.details: Create endpoints to accept file uploads, implement parsing logic to extract metadata.

subtasks.title: Design Ingestion API Endpoints
subtasks.description: Create RESTful endpoints to accept audio and video file uploads.
subtasks.details: Define input parameters, response formats, and error handling for all endpoints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests with mock server responses.

subtasks.title: Implement File Upload Handling
subtasks.description: Develop logic to receive files through the designated endpoints.
subtasks.details: Handle file storage and temporary processing before parsing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Integration tests with actual file uploads.

subtasks.title: Create Parsing Logic
subtasks.description: Implement algorithms to extract metadata from audio and video files.
subtasks.details: Support parsing formats including MP3, WAV for audio; MP4, AVI for video.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests with known file samples.

subtasks.title: Refine Error Handling
subtasks.description: Improve error handling and logging mechanisms in the ingestion framework.
subtasks.details: Ensure comprehensive error logging and user feedback for failed uploads or parsing issues.

subtasks.title: Document Ingestion Framework
subtasks.description: Create detailed documentation on the ingestion framework's endpoints and usage.
subtasks.details: Include examples, setup instructions, and API reference for users.
subtasks.testStrategy: Code review and feedback from team members.

tasks.expansionPrompt: How are you planning to handle file uploads, and what metadata will be extracted? What measures will you take to ensure data integrity during the ingestion process?

tasks.title: Transcription Service Integration
tasks.description: Integrate transcription services (e.g., Whisper, AssemblyAI) into the system.
tasks.details: Set up API keys, implement error handling, integrate real-time status updates via WebSocket.

subtasks.title: Set up API keys for Whisper transcription service
subtasks.description: Create and configure API keys for the Whisper transcription service.
subtasks.details: Generate API key, save securely in environment variables.

subtasks.title: Implement error handling for Whisper integration
subtasks.description: Handle errors during transcription service calls and provide meaningful feedback to users.
subtasks.details: Catch exceptions, log errors, display appropriate messages.

subtasks.title: Integrate real-time status updates via WebSocket for Whisper
subtasks.description: Set up WebSocket to receive and transmit real-time status updates from the transcription service.
subtasks.details: Establish WebSocket connection, handle incoming data, display in UI.

subtasks.title: Set up API keys for AssemblyAI transcription service
subtasks.description: Create and configure API keys for the AssemblyAI transcription service.
subtasks.details: Generate API key, save securely in environment variables.

subtasks.title: Integrate real-time status updates via WebSocket for AssemblyAI
subtasks.description: Set up WebSocket to receive and transmit real-time status updates from the transcription service.
subtasks.details: Establish WebSocket connection, handle incoming data, display in UI.

tasks.expansionPrompt: What specific features of the transcription service do you need to integrate into your system, and how will you handle real-time status updates? What measures will you take to ensure error handling?

tasks.title: Content Generation Service Integration
tasks.description: Integrate content generation services (e.g., GPT-4, Claude) into the system.
tasks.details: Set up API keys, implement error handling, integrate real-time status updates via WebSocket.

subtasks.title: Set up API keys for content generation services
subtasks.description: Obtain and configure API keys from GPT-4 and Claude services.
subtasks.details: Create API key files and store securely. Update service configuration with new keys.

subtasks.title: Implement error handling for content generation requests
subtasks.description: Develop code to handle errors gracefully during content generation API calls.
subtasks.details: Catch exceptions, log errors, and return appropriate messages or fallback strategies.

subtasks.title: Integrate real-time status updates via WebSocket
subtasks.description: Set up a WebSocket connection to receive content generation progress updates in real-time.
subtasks.details: Use a WebSocket library to establish a persistent connection and broadcast updates.

subtasks.title: Test integration of content generation services
subtasks.description: Write automated tests to ensure proper setup, error handling, and real-time updates.
subtasks.details: Use unit tests and integration tests to validate functionality.

subtasks.title: Document the integration process
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for setting up, using, and troubleshooting content generation services.
subtasks.details: Write user guides, API documentation, and maintenance notes.

tasks.expansionPrompt: What specific features of the content generation service do you need to integrate into your system, and how will you handle real-time status updates? What measures will you take to ensure error handling?

tasks.title: Background Processing System Development
tasks.description: Develop a system to handle long-running background tasks.
tasks.details: Implement task queue using Celery, set up worker processes, integrate progress tracking and error handling.

subtasks.title: Setup Celery Task Queue
subtasks.description: Install and configure Celery for managing background tasks.
subtasks.details: Install Celery using pip, create a Celery app instance.

subtasks.title: Implement Worker Processes
subtasks.description: Set up and configure worker processes to handle tasks.
subtasks.details: Create Celery worker scripts, define task functions in separate modules.

subtasks.title: Integrate Progress Tracking
subtasks.description: Add functionality to track the progress of background tasks.
subtasks.details: Develop a model or use an existing library to store task progress data.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Handling
subtasks.description: Add robust error handling mechanisms for background tasks.
subtasks.details: Create a system to capture and log errors, define retry logic where necessary.

subtasks.title: Testing Background Tasks
subtasks.description: Develop tests to ensure background tasks are handled correctly.
subtasks.details: Write unit and integration tests for task functions, progress tracking, and error handling.

tasks.expansionPrompt: What are the specific tasks that need to be handled by the background processing system, and how will you manage task queues and worker processes? What measures will you take to ensure error handling and progress tracking?

tasks.title: User Interface Design
tasks.description: Design the user interface for the application.
tasks.details: Create wireframes and mockups for both web and mobile versions, ensure responsiveness.

subtasks.title: Create Wireframes for Web Version
subtasks.description: Develop wireframes for the web application interface.
subtasks.details: Use tools like Sketch, Figma or Adobe XD.

subtasks.title: Create Mockups for Web Version
subtasks.description: Transform wireframes into detailed mockups with visual elements.
subtasks.details: Ensure usability and adherence to design principles.

subtasks.title: Create Wireframes for Mobile Version
subtasks.description: Develop wireframes for the mobile application interface.
subtasks.details: Use responsive design principles.

subtasks.title: Create Mockups for Mobile Version
subtasks.description: Transform wireframes into detailed mockups with visual elements.
subtasks.details: Ensure usability and adherence to design principles.

subtasks.title: Review and Finalize Design Specifications
subtasks.description: Gather feedback from stakeholders and finalize the design specifications.
subtasks.details: Prepare a document outlining all interface elements and their functions.

tasks.expansionPrompt: What are the key features of the user interface you need to design, and what considerations do you have for responsiveness across different devices? How will you ensure that the design is intuitive and user-friendly?

tasks.title: User Interface Implementation
tasks.description: Implement the user interface based on design specifications.
tasks.details: Develop front-end components, integrate with back-end services, ensure a seamless user experience.

subtasks.title: Design Web Front-End Components
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and mockups for web components based on design specifications.
subtasks.details: Use Sketch or Figma to design web UI elements.

subtasks.title: Design Mobile Front-End Components
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and mockups for mobile components based on design specifications.
subtasks.details: Use Sketch or Figma to design mobile UI elements.

subtasks.title: Develop Web Front-End Components
subtasks.description: Implement web front-end components based on the designed wireframes and mockups.
subtasks.details: Use React or Vue.js for component development.

subtasks.title: Develop Mobile Front-End Components
subtasks.description: Implement mobile front-end components based on the designed wireframes and mockups.
subtasks.details: Use React Native for component development.

subtasks.title: Integrate Front-End with Back-End
subtasks.description: Ensure seamless integration of front-end components with back-end services.
subtasks.details: Use RESTful APIs for communication between front-end and back-end.

tasks.expansionPrompt: What are the key components of the user interface you need to implement, and how will you ensure that they integrate smoothly with the back-end services? What testing strategies will you use to validate the implementation?

tasks.title: Integration Testing
tasks.description: Test all components to ensure they work together seamlessly.
tasks.details: Simulate real-world usage scenarios, test external integrations (e.g., API calls), ensure data consistency and reliability.

subtasks.title: Simulate Real-World Usage Scenarios
subtasks.description: Create test cases that mimic actual user interactions with the system.
subtasks.details: Use mock data and simulate various user workflows.

subtasks.title: Test External Integrations (API Calls)
subtasks.description: Validate the functionality of API calls with external services.
subtasks.details: Send test requests and check for successful responses.

subtasks.title: Ensure Data Consistency
subtasks.description: Verify that data remains consistent across different components.
subtasks.details: Run tests to check for any discrepancies in data storage or retrieval.

subtasks.title: Ensure Data Reliability
subtasks.description: Test the robustness of data handling under load and failure conditions.
subtasks.details: Conduct stress testing and error simulation to ensure reliability.

subtasks.title: Document Testing Results
subtasks.description: Prepare a report detailing the results of integration tests.
subtasks.details: Summarize findings and suggest any necessary corrections or improvements.

tasks.expansionPrompt: What are the key scenarios you need to test for real-world usage, and how will you ensure that external integrations (API calls) work as expected? What measures will you take to simulate failures?

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize the system for performance and scalability.
tasks.details: Profile and analyze system bottlenecks, implement optimizations (e.g., caching, indexing), scale infrastructure as needed.

subtasks.title: Profile System Performance
subtasks.description: Use profiling tools to identify key performance bottlenecks.
subtasks.details: Run CPU and memory usage tests, log slow queries or operations.

subtasks.title: Analyze Bottleneck Causes
subtasks.description: Examine logs and profiling data to determine root causes of performance issues.
subtasks.details: Document findings, prioritize areas for optimization.

subtasks.title: Implement Caching Mechanisms
subtasks.description: Add caching layers to reduce database load and improve response times.
subtasks.details: Select appropriate caching solutions (e.g., Redis), configure for application.

subtasks.title: Optimize Database Queries
subtasks.description: Refactor SQL queries to improve efficiency and reduce execution time.
subtasks.details: Use query optimization tools, index frequently accessed columns.

subtasks.title: Scale Infrastructure
subtasks.description: Increase resources (e.g., CPU, memory) to handle increased load.
subtasks.details: Implement auto-scaling policies, upgrade hardware if necessary.

tasks.expansionPrompt: What specific areas of performance are you targeting, and what techniques will you use to optimize the system? How will you measure the impact of your optimizations?

tasks.title: Security Assessment and Hardening
tasks.description: Assess the security of the system and implement necessary hardening measures.
tasks.details: Conduct security audits, identify vulnerabilities, patch them, ensure compliance with security standards (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).

subtasks.title: Conduct Security Audits
subtasks.description: Perform thorough security audits to identify vulnerabilities.
subtasks.details: Use penetration testing tools and vulnerability scanners.

subtasks.title: Identify Vulnerabilities
subtasks.description: Analyze audit results to pinpoint specific vulnerabilities.
subtasks.details: Document all identified vulnerabilities and prioritize them.

subtasks.title: Patch Vulnerabilities
subtasks.description: Apply patches and updates to fix identified vulnerabilities.
subtasks.details: Develop and implement security patches for all critical issues.

subtasks.title: Ensure Compliance with Security Standards
subtasks.description: Verify compliance with relevant security standards (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).
subtasks.details: Conduct a detailed review and implement any necessary adjustments.

subtasks.title: Review and Validate Security Hardening
subtasks.description: Finalize security hardening measures and validate their effectiveness.
subtasks.details: Conduct a final audit to ensure all measures are implemented correctly.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Break down this task with a focus on security assessment and hardening.

tasks.title: User Training and Documentation
tasks.description: Provide training for users and document the system.
tasks.details: Develop training materials (e.g., tutorials, FAQs), create comprehensive user manuals and API documentation.

subtasks.title: Develop Tutorial Materials
subtasks.description: Create detailed tutorials for users to understand system features.
subtasks.details: Design and write step-by-step tutorials covering key functionalities.

subtasks.title: Create Comprehensive User Manuals
subtasks.description: Generate a user manual that covers all system features in depth.
subtasks.details: Organize the manual into sections, covering setup, usage, and troubleshooting.

subtasks.title: Write API Documentation
subtasks.description: Document the system's APIs for developers to use.
subtasks.details: Include details on endpoints, request/response formats, and examples.

subtasks.title: Review and Revise Training Materials
subtasks.description: Ensure tutorials and manuals are accurate and easy to understand.
subtasks.details: Conduct peer review and make necessary edits based on feedback.

subtasks.title: Publish Documentation
subtasks.description: Make the training materials and manuals available to users.
subtasks.details: Upload documentation to a central repository or user portal.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Break down this task with a focus on user training and documentation.

tasks.title: Launch Preparation
tasks.description: Prepare for the launch of the application.
tasks.details: Finalize testing, perform system checks, prepare for deployment (e.g., CI/CD pipeline), plan post-launch support and maintenance.

subtasks.title: Finalize Testing
subtasks.description: Ensure all tests are completed and pass.
subtasks.details: Review test cases, execute tests, fix bugs, repeat until all tests pass.

subtasks.title: Perform System Checks
subtasks.description: Validate the system's stability and readiness for launch.
subtasks.details: Run diagnostics, check performance, ensure all systems are operational.

subtasks.title: Prepare Deployment Environment
subtasks.description: Set up the deployment environment according to the CI/CD pipeline requirements.
subtasks.details: Configure servers, install necessary software, set up version control, deploy initial code.

subtasks.title: Plan Post-Launch Support and Maintenance
subtasks.description: Develop a plan for ongoing support and maintenance after launch.
subtasks.details: Identify potential issues, outline support procedures, schedule maintenance windows.

subtasks.title: Review and Approve Launch Plan
subtasks.description: Ensure all aspects of the launch preparation are complete and ready for execution.
subtasks.details: Conduct a final review, address any remaining issues, get approval from stakeholders.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Break down this task with a focus on launch preparation.
